title: Bug 18705: Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: The report mentions excessive flashing in the Control Example but lacks a clear explanation for the issue.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: The expected behavior is for the Control Example to run without excessive flashing when resizing the window. The flashing issue should be addressed to ensure a smoother user experience.
SR: To reproduce the problem, run the Control Example and resize the window in the vertical direction only. Observe the excessive flashing in all tabs of the TabFolder and Frames.
